title: Dark Cinematic Whooshes, Swooshes, Pass Bys & Transitions
description: 200 dark cinematic, tension-building whooshes, swooshes, pass by & transitions sound effects!
longDescription:
Soundcloud Demo:Â https://soundcloud.com/soundresponse/thriller-whooshes-demo


Thriller Whooshes sound library features 200 professionally designed, tension-building, scary horror whooshes, swooshes and transition sound effects that will help you to enhance the feeling of anticipation and keep your audience on the edge of their seats!


In contrast to our first installment of whoosh sound effects Whooshes & Transitions that features predominantly sci-fi whoosh sound effects best suited for sci fi sounds, weapons, spaceship pass-by and fly-by sound effects, Thriller Whooshes sample pack contains intense thriller whoosh and transition sound effects, designed using exclusively organic source sounds recorded with high-end recorders and microphones, in order for sound effects to be more raw-sounding and frightening. If you're looking for sinister-sounding swooshes and creepy transition sound effects, this sound collection will provide you with the right sonic tool to intensify the atmosphere of your project!


If you like the sound of Thriller Whooshes be sure to check out Thriller Risers and Sci-Fi Whooshes libraries as well!


Thriller Whooshes Sound Effects List
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Waves: 200

Number of Audio Cues: 200

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 15.05 min
